Title: Nighthawks
Overview: When one of Europe's most lethal terrorists shows up in New York, an elite undercover cop is assigned to take him down by any means necessary.
Tagline: A terrorist holds New York in a grip of fear - and only Stallone can take him on.
production_companies: Universal Pictures, Martin Poll Productions, The Production Company
Cast: Sylvester Stallone, Rutger Hauer, Billy Dee Williams
